ayahs.textUthmani: هَلْ يَنظُرُونَ إِلَّآ أَن تَأْتِيَهُمُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ أَوْ يَأْتِىَ رَبُّكَ أَوْ يَأْتِىَ بَعْضُ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكَ ۗ يَوْمَ يَأْتِى بَعْضُ ءَايَـٰتِ رَبِّكَ لَا يَنفَعُ نَفْسًا إِيمَـٰنُهَا لَمْ تَكُنْ ءَامَنَتْ مِن قَبْلُ أَوْ كَسَبَتْ فِىٓ إِيمَـٰنِهَا خَيْرًا ۗ قُلِ ٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مُنتَظِرُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: هَلْ [Are] يَنظُرُونَ [they waiting] إِلَّآ [except] أَن [that] تَأْتِيَهُمُ [comes to them] ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ [the Angels] أَوْ [or] يَأْتِىَ [comes] رَبُّكَ [your Lord] أَوْ [or] يَأْتِىَ [comes] بَعْضُ [some (of)] ءَايَـٰتِ [(the) Signs] رَبِّكَ ۗ [(of) your Lord] يَوْمَ [(The) Day] يَأْتِى [(when) comes] بَعْضُ [some (of)] ءَايَـٰتِ [(the) Signs] رَبِّكَ [(of) your Lord] لَا [not] يَنفَعُ [will benefit] نَفْسًا [a soul] إِيمَـٰنُهَا [its faith] لَمْ [not] تَكُنْ [(if) it had] ءَامَنَتْ [believed] مِن [from] قَبْلُ [before] أَوْ [or] كَسَبَتْ [earned] فِىٓ [through] إِيمَـٰنِهَا [its faith] خَيْرًۭا ۗ [any good] قُلِ [Say] ٱنتَظِرُوٓا۟ [Wait] إِنَّا [Indeed, we] مُنتَظِرُونَ [(are) those who wait]
ayahs.transliteration: Hal yanthuroona illaan ta/tiyahumu almala-ikatu aw ya/tiya rabbuka aw ya/tiyabaAAdu ayati rabbika yawma ya/tee baAAduayati rabbika la yanfaAAu nafsan eemanuhalam takun amanat min qablu aw kasabat fee eemanihakhayran quli intathiroo inna muntathiroon

ayahs.textUthmani: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ فَرَّقُوا۟ دِينَهُمْ وَكَانُوا۟ شِيَعًا لَّسْتَ مِنْهُمْ فِى شَىْءٍ ۚ إِنَّمَآ أَمْرُهُمْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ثُمَّ يُنَبِّئُهُم بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَفْعَلُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: إِنَّ [Indeed] ٱلَّذِينَ [those who] فَرَّقُوا۟ [divide] دِينَهُمْ [their religion] وَكَانُوا۟ [and become] شِيَعًۭا [sects] لَّسْتَ [you are not] مِنْهُمْ [with them] فِى [in] شَىْءٍ ۚ [anything] إِنَّمَآ [Only] أَمْرُهُمْ [their affair] إِلَى [(is) with] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] ثُمَّ [then] يُنَبِّئُهُم [He will inform them] بِمَا [of what] كَانُوا۟ [they used to] يَفْعَلُونَ [do]
ayahs.transliteration: Inna allatheena farraqoo deenahumwakanoo shiyaAAan lasta minhum fee shay-in innamaamruhum ila Allahi thumma yunabbi-ohum bimakanoo yafAAaloon

ayahs.textUthmani: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ عَشْرُ أَمْثَالِهَا ۖ وَمَن جَآءَ بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ فَلَا يُجْزَىٰٓ إِلَّا مِثْلَهَا وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: مَن [Whoever] جَآءَ [came] بِٱلْحَسَنَةِ [with a good deed] فَلَهُۥ [then for him] عَشْرُ [(is) ten (times)] أَمْثَالِهَا ۖ [the like of it] وَمَن [And whoever] جَآءَ [came] بِٱلسَّيِّئَةِ [with an evil deed] فَلَا [then not] يُجْزَىٰٓ [he will be recompensed] إِلَّا [except] مِثْلَهَا [the like of it] وَهُمْ [and they] لَا [will not] يُظْلَمُونَ [(be) wronged]
ayahs.transliteration: Man jaa bilhasanatifalahu AAashru amthaliha waman jaa bissayyi-atifala yujza illa mithlaha wahum layuthlamoon

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنَّنِى هَدَىٰنِى رَبِّىٓ إِلَىٰ صِرَٰطٍ مُّسْتَقِيمٍ دِينًا قِيَمًا مِّلَّةَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفًا ۚ وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنَّنِى [Indeed (as for) me] هَدَىٰنِى [has guided me] رَبِّىٓ [my Lord] إِلَىٰ [to] صِرَٰطٍۢ [a path] مُّسْتَقِيمٍۢ [straight ] دِينًۭا [a religion] قِيَمًۭا [right] مِّلَّةَ [religion] إِبْرَٰهِيمَ [(of) Ibrahim ] حَنِيفًۭا ۚ [a true monotheist] وَمَا [And not] كَانَ [he was] مِنَ [from] ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ [the polytheists]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul innanee hadanee rabbee ilasiratin mustaqeemin deenan qiyaman millata ibraheemahaneefan wama kana mina almushrikeen

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ إِنَّ صَلَاتِى وَنُسُكِى وَمَحْيَاىَ وَمَمَاتِى لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] إِنَّ [Indeed] صَلَاتِى [my prayer] وَنُسُكِى [and my rites of sacrifice] وَمَحْيَاىَ [and my living] وَمَمَاتِى [and my dying] لِلَّهِ [(are) for Allah] رَبِّ [Lord] ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ [(of) the worlds]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul inna salatee wanusukeewamahyaya wamamatee lillahi rabbialAAalameen

ayahs.textUthmani: لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُۥ ۖ وَبِذَٰلِكَ أُمِرْتُ وَأَنَا۠ أَوَّلُ ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ
ayahs.wordByWord: لَا [No] شَرِيكَ [partners] لَهُۥ ۖ [for Him] وَبِذَٰلِكَ [and with that] أُمِرْتُ [I have been commanded] وَأَنَا۠ [And I am] أَوَّلُ [(the) first] ٱلْمُسْلِمِينَ [(of) the ones who surrender (to Him)]
ayahs.transliteration: La shareeka lahu wabithalikaomirtu waana awwalu almuslimeen

ayahs.textUthmani: قُلْ أَغَيْرَ ٱللَّهِ أَبْغِى رَبًّا وَهُوَ رَبُّ كُلِّ شَىْءٍ ۚ وَلَا تَكْسِبُ كُلُّ نَفْسٍ إِلَّا عَلَيْهَا ۚ وَلَا تَزِرُ وَازِرَةٌ وِزْرَ أُخْرَىٰ ۚ ثُمَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكُم مَّرْجِعُكُمْ فَيُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
ayahs.wordByWord: قُلْ [Say] أَغَيْرَ [Is (it) other than] ٱللَّهِ [Allah] أَبْغِى [I (should) seek] رَبًّۭا [(as) a Lord] وَهُوَ [while He] رَبُّ [(is) the Lord] كُلِّ [(of) every] شَىْءٍۢ ۚ [thing] وَلَا [And not] تَكْسِبُ [earns] كُلُّ [every] نَفْسٍ [soul] إِلَّا [except] عَلَيْهَا ۚ [against itself] وَلَا [and not] تَزِرُ [bears] وَازِرَةٌۭ [any bearer of burden] وِزْرَ [burden] أُخْرَىٰ ۚ [(of) another] ثُمَّ [Then] إِلَىٰ [to] رَبِّكُم [your Lord] مَّرْجِعُكُمْ [(is) your return] فَيُنَبِّئُكُم [then He will inform you] بِمَا [about what] كُنتُمْ [you were] فِيهِ [concerning it] تَخْتَلِفُونَ [differing]
ayahs.transliteration: Qul aghayra Allahi abghee rabbanwahuwa rabbu kulli shay-in wala taksibu kullu nafsin illaAAalayha wala taziru waziratun wizra okhrathumma ila rabbikum marjiAAukum fayunabbi-okum bimakuntum feehi takhtalifoon

ayahs.textUthmani: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِى جَعَلَكُمْ خَلَـٰٓئِفَ ٱلْأَرْضِ وَرَفَعَ بَعْضَكُمْ فَوْقَ بَعْضٍ دَرَجَـٰتٍ لِّيَبْلُوَكُمْ فِى مَآ ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۗ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْعِقَابِ وَإِنَّهُۥ لَغَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌۢ
ayahs.wordByWord: وَهُوَ [And He] ٱلَّذِى [(is) the One Who] جَعَلَكُمْ [(has) made you] خَلَـٰٓئِفَ [successors] ٱلْأَرْضِ [(of) the earth] وَرَفَعَ [and raised] بَعْضَكُمْ [some of you] فَوْقَ [above] بَعْضٍۢ [others] دَرَجَـٰتٍۢ [(in) ranks] لِّيَبْلُوَكُمْ [so that He may test you] فِى [in] مَآ [what] ءَاتَىٰكُمْ ۗ [He has given you] إِنَّ [Indeed] رَبَّكَ [your Lord] سَرِيعُ [(is) swift] ٱلْعِقَابِ [(in) the punishment] وَإِنَّهُۥ [and indeed, He (is)] لَغَفُورٌۭ [[certainly], Oft-Forgiving] رَّحِيمٌۢ [Most Merciful]
ayahs.transliteration: Wahuwa allathee jaAAalakum khala-ifaal-ardi warafaAAa baAAdakum fawqa baAAdindarajatin liyabluwakum fee ma atakuminna rabbaka sareeAAu alAAiqabi wa-innahu laghafoorun raheem

words.translation: so that He may test you
